resources.string:
You can say:
• next • previous 
• flip • exit 
when in an activity.

Swipe down at anytime to go back to the Activity Menu.
Say \"ok, glass\" then speak your selection from the pop up menu.
Say "next" to go to the next card, or swipe back
Say "previous" to go to the next card, or swipe forward
Say "flip" to flip the card, or tap
Say "main menu" to go to the main menu, or swipe down
Say "exit" at anytime to exit\nEnd of Instructions
Welcome to the flashcards, you can say the name of the bird or any other appropriate commands. Say start to begin!
This tutorial will instruct how to navigate through the flashcards. Say start to begin
That\'s all! Remember you can say the actions next, previous, flip, play, the name of a bird, main menu to go to the main menu and exit to close the program... Have fun learning!!
"Keep at it and you will learn more!"
"Good job, maybe you should review again!"
